name: Amazing Gymnastic Ice Queen Adventure Xmas Edition
name_original: Amazing Gymnastic Ice Queen Adventure Xmas Edition
description:
mazing Ice Queen Gymnastics Xmas Edition is in store now!

Extremely challenging and addictive Gymnastics game for your Xmas holiday!

Are you ready to joint the magical icy Gymnastics journey with our pretty Ice Queen and her snowman buddy?

Be ready to sets off on icy journey through the snowy mountains and show your gymnastic skills as you win the Ice Queen Adventure!

Jump, Run and tumbling your way in the frozen mountain. Unlike staying in the cozy hair beauty salons, can you stand the cold? Challenge your balance on the icy blocks can you get through all the obstacles?

Download today !
